meta.description: Minimize the total number of containers and trucks needed to transport oil to the port under given constraints.

sets.name: VEHICLES
sets.description: Types of vehicles used for transporting oil.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each vehicle type in units of oil.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of vehicle used.

objective.name: min_total_vehicles
objective.description: Minimize the total number of containers and trucks used.

constraints.name: oil_requirement
constraints.description: At least 2000 units of oil need to be sent to the port.

constraints.name: min_containers
constraints.description: At least 15 containers need to be used.

constraints.name: truck_container_ratio
constraints.description: The number of trucks used has to be at most half the number of containers used.
